dmca.title: Mensa says PetsorFood doesn't make the grade
dmca.body: Our records indicate you are not now and have never been a member of this organization under this name or any variation on it.  If you are a member, by reply email please provide your membership number or remove any reference to Mensa from your web site within 72 hours. Mensa is a registered trademark of American Mensa Limited and may not be used without permission.  Failure to comply may result in civil and criminal penalties.
